sentences: On noin 250 eri vähemmistöryhmää, joihin kuhunkin kuuluu alle 100 henkilöä.
context: The word 'kukin' is an indefinite pronoun in Finnish that means 'each' or 'every one'. It can be used to refer to items in a group individually. The wiktionary definition shows it has multiple forms depending on the case, and also plural forms like 'kutkin', which are used with words that only exist in the plural form.  The inflectional stem is 'ku-' for all forms.
